ApplicationName._comment: Human-readable name of the application.  It should be short and not include classifiers such as 'knowledge graph'.

ApplicationDescription._comment: Detailed description of what the application does.  Focus on how the application is used to solve business problems

Owner._comment: Name of the owner or responsible party for the application.

TargetAvailabilityDate._comment: The timeframe we would like this application to be available to our customers.  This is currently a freeform text.

GraphAlgorithms._comment: A list of the graph algorithms used in this solution kit separated by commas.

GraphFeatures._comment: A list of the graph algorithms used in this solution kit separated by commas.

ROIDashboardMetrics._comment: A list of the graph algorithms used in this solution kit separated by commas.

MLModels._comment: A list of the machine-learning models used in this solution kit separated by commas

CurrentDevelopmentStatus._comment: Current stage in the development lifecycle of the application.

Personas._comment: Optional. List of personas representing typical users of the application.

items._comment: Details about the questions to be addressed by the chatbot application.
